titles.title: Honoring the life and achievements of His Holiness Pope John Paul II and expressing profound sorrow on his death.

action.text: Consideration initiated pursuant to a previous order.
Considered pursuant to a previous order.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 190.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to a previous order of the House.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 415 - 0 (Roll no. 94).

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 4/6/2005--Passed House without amendment. Honors the life and work of Pope John Paul II. Expresses condolences to the people of Poland for the loss of such an inspirational figure in Poland's political transformation. Extends sympathy to Catholics around the world who looked to the Pope as Supreme Pontiff. Calls upon the people of the United States to reflect on the Pope's life during the worldwide period of remembrance following his death.
